topic.title: Desktop Internet Banking application
topic.shortdesc: Internet banking application is a web application implementing the internet banking GUI. It is a React-based web application, implementing complete GUI logic (rendering bank data, processing user request flows, certification (signing), etc.), communicating with server components only via data REST and/or GraphQL APIs. Internet Banking implements a GUI for on-behalf access, where a bank employee operates the solution on behalf of a selected user.
